	</div>
	
	<div class="spacer"></div>
	
	<div id="copyrightFooter">	
		<div id="copyright">copyright &copy; 2010-{current_time format="%Y"}</div>
		<div id="footermenu">
			<ul>
				<li class="first"><a href="http://www.solspace.com/">Solspace</a></li>
				<li class=""><a href="http://www.solspace.com/docs/addon/c/Facebook_Connect/">Facebook Connect Module Documentation</a></li>
				<li class=""><a href="http://www.solspace.com/software/detail/facebook_connect/">Facebook Connect Module</a></li>
			</ul>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

{exp:fbc:prepare_page}

</body>
</html>
